title: Slingshot Fortress
description: Slingshot Fortress is a casual destroy 2D action game that turns every shot into a flashback of your younger, more menacing days. Get ready to shoot stones, bombs, and shurikens, and let your slingshot shine as you smash through towering fortresses to uncover and defeat sneaky hidden creatures. Each level takes you to vibrant, ever-changing landscapesâ€”from lush forests to icy tundras. Slingshot Fortress is the ultimate test of your aim and ingenuity. Sling, smash, and conquer in this nostalgic game.
